meanings.definition: A small computer that contains a microprocessor for its central processing unit.
meanings.sent1: My dad fixed the microcomputer in our house.
meanings.sent2: I use my microcomputer to play games and do homework.
meanings.sent3: The microcomputer decided to take a break and shut down unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, the microcomputer is the heart that keeps everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The tiny microcomputer hummed quietly as it processed data at lightning speed.

meanings.definition: A personal computer designed for individual use.
meanings.sent1: The microcomputer on my desk helps me stay organized.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new microcomputer for her home office.
meanings.sent3: The microcomputer seemed to have a mind of its own, opening random programs.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed through the microcomputer, turning into written words on the screen.
meanings.sent5: With a sleek design, the microcomputer was a stylish addition to her workspace.
